Package angryflappybird

Class Defines

  • java.lang.Object
    • angryflappybird.Defines
  • public class Defines
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the dimensions, coefficients and parameters of the application and its components. This includes the sizes of the application window, scenes and the sprite images. The class defines the values that determine the parameters for animation. The filenames of the images and their corresponding image objects are defined. This class can be used to define other components such as buttons etc that might

        public javafx.scene.image.Image resizeImage​(java.lang.String filepath,
                                            int width,
                                            int height)
        Creates a resized image and adds it to the IMAGE map variable.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the filename of the image that needs to be resized
        width - the new width of the image
        height - the new height of the image
        Returns:
        the image object located
